title: First Electronic TV
description: Philo Farnsworth successfully demonstrated the world's first all-electronic television.

title: First Color TV
description: RCA introduced the CT-100, the first mass-produced color television set.

title: Flat Panel TV
description: Pioneer introduced the first consumer plasma TV, marking the beginning of the flat-screen era.

title: OLED TV
description: Sony released the XEL-1, the first TV using OLED technology, known for its perfect blacks.

title: 4K UHD TV
description: Ultra HD TVs with four times the resolution of Full HD became more common.

title: 8K TV
description: 8K TVs entered the market, offering even higher resolution than 4K.

title: Rollable TV
description: LG introduced the world's first rollable OLED TV, a flexible screen that can retract into its base.
